txt.en: Your mission is to find and free the captured scouts in Vorkodar.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Vorkodar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'I received word that my scouts have located a den of hobgoblins deep in the mountains, but four of the scouts never returned. I suspect they have been captured. I need you to infiltrate Vorkodar and rescue them before they are executed, or worse!'
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Hobgoblins' lair. Good luck.'
'Thank Drasa you arrived when you did! My scouts all arrived in one piece. Good work, [placeholder].'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
Several scouts keeping watch on the hobgoblin's den failed to report back. They must be rescued before it is too late!\n\nYour mission is to find and free the captured scouts in Vorkodar.
You have been tasked with rescuing dwarf scouts from the clutches of the hobgoblins.
Some monsters in this mission will attempt a crushing attack, wounding and stunning anyone hit.
